name: coop-conversion-success
description: Students share stories about converting co-ops to full-time offers.

events.content: For those who converted co-ops to full-time offers, what sealed the deal?
Weekly sync with my manager + kept a brag doc. Sent a wrap-up deck during week 10 showing impact.
Also ask early if thereâ€™s headcount. HR told me to expect an answer by week 8, so I nudged politely until they mailed the offer.
Got it. Brag doc starts today.
